BotCommand.name: twitter
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: twitter {<u>screenname<u> | <u>tweetid<u>} Displays the tweet with the specified <u>tweetid<u> or the most recent tweet by the user with the specified <u>screenname<u>.

BotCommand.name: add
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: twitter add {<u>screenname<u> | <u>id<u>} Adds the Twitter user with the specified <u>screenname<u> or <u>id<u> to the feed list.

BotCommand.name: del
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: twitter del {<u>screenname<u> | <u>id<u>} Deletes the Twitter user with the specified <u>screenname<u> or <u>id<u> from the feed list.

BotCommand.name: format
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: twitter format [<u>format<u>] Displays or sets the current channel's tweet format. See https://linqtotwitter.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Status%20Entity for items allowed in the format string.
